page.title: 08PLAYGROUP AND SCHOOLS
page.content: The PLAYGROUP meets on Monday and Thursday morning in the Methodist Schoolrooms.There are two paid leaders.The ANTHONY CURTON AIDED SCHOOL opened in September 1983 following the closure of CURTONS ENDOWED and WALPOLE ST ANDREW primary schools.The school has 125 pupils and 4.5 teachers.There is a school hall which is used by the community as are the classrooms.The field is a triangular shape but the school does have access to the playing field.There is a PARENT TEACHERS AND FRIENDS ASSOCIATION which in its first 18 months has raised almost Â£2,000.The largest item bought for the school is a B.B.C. computer.
